thread.title_full: Ground News - Pooler Parkway North at I-16 shutdown due to accident with serious injuries

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Pooler Parkway North at I-16 shutdown due to accident with serious injuries
text:
Summary by Ground News According to a Facebook post, Pooler Parkway North at Inerstate 16 is currently shut down due to an accident with serious injuries. Traffic is being diverted onto I-16 East as First Responders tend to those involved and work to clear the scene. Pooler PD has confirmed one lane of travel has opened while the other remains closed.
